meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lindsey Piesz Dom Granello Marty Cunningham Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7696.

td.p: Lindsey Piesz, a merchandise planner from Indianapolis, Indiana
Dom Granello, a project manager from Madison, Wisconsin
Marty Cunningham, an accountant and voice artist from Arvada, Colorado (whose 2-day cash winnings total $49,100)

tr.td: DUMB CRIMINALS
FITNESS ABBREV.
EVERYBODY'S A CRITIC
8-LETTER WORDS
FEDORA
THE EXPLORER

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
